help.description: This command simply informs you on the commands available and serves as a starting point for new users.

ping.description: This command tells you the ping which is the amount of time it takes for the bot to respond to a request. This number may be quite high.

coinflip.description: This command flips a coin and tells you whether the result was Heads or Tails. Not that exciting.

info.description: This command tells you some useful links relating to the bot and some other nifty statistics.

encrypt.description: (Only works in DM) This command encrypt your inputted text. The encryption is very weak so don't use it for any important information.

decrypt.description: (Only works in DM) This command decrypts your encrypted text. You can only decrypt text that you encrypted using ChigBot.

server.description: This command tells you useful information about the server you are currently in.

balance.description: This command tells you your balance. Do ch bal [@Chig#4519] to find out someone else's balance.
balance.usage: ch balance/bal OR ch balance/bal [mention someone]

gamble.description: This command basically flips a coin. If Heads, it gives you 1.5x your gambled amount of credits back and if Tails, you lose your gambled amount of credits.
gamble.usage: ch gamble [amount of credits to be gambled]

invite.description: This command will return the link required to invite ChigBot to other servers.

daily.description: This command will be able to give you 100+10% of your credits every day.

weekly.description: This command will be able to give you 100+33% of your credits every week.

leaderboard.description: This command shows you the Top 10 users in terms of credits.Type ch board global to view the worldwide credit standings.
leaderboard.usage: ch leaderboard/board OR ch board global/world

give.description: This command allows you to give credits to your friends. :)

prefix.description: This command allows the owner of the server to change the prefix
prefix.usage: ch prefix [prefix] OR ch prefix default
